name: Dugan v. Dupont Borough School District, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Dugan v. Dupont Borough School District

judges: Before Maxex, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Dugan v. Dupont Borough School District, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Valentine; costs to be paid by the School District of the Borough of Dupont.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Charles E. Kenworthey and Arthur H. James, with them Frank J. Flannery, for appellant.
Arthur A. Maguire, with Mm Andrew Eourigan Jr., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Dugan v. Dupont Borough School District, Appellant.
Argued April 14, 1948.
Before Maxex, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Charles E. Kenworthey and Arthur H. James, with them Frank J. Flannery, for appellant.
July 7, 1948:
Arthur A. Maguire, with Mm Andrew Eourigan Jr., for appellee.
